items.title: Share buybacks by listed companies is a bad idea
items.description: The best way to boost share price is through business performance, not financial engineering. Buybacks, in particular, are unfair to the patient investor who stays invested. If a firm has surplus cash and no meaningful avenue of deployment, a special dividend is a clean option to return money to shareholders

items.title: FTX sues Binance and its former CEO for $1.8 billion
items.description: The lawsuit relates to Binance’s sale of its stake in Sam Bankman-Fried’s FTX, which it acquired in 2019 but then negotiated to sell back to FTX in July 2021.

items.title: Aditya Birla Capital: Growth levers in place for this financial services player
items.description: Digital initiatives and group synergies will aid growth; merger of the NBFC arm could lift valuation

items.title: Protean — Modest earnings in Q2, but huge headroom for growth
items.description: Stock valuation justified by dominant market position, unique business moats, and tailwinds from digital penetration

items.title: SAMHI Hotels: Expansion plans add to earnings visibility
items.description: Robust cash flow generation will ensure that SAMHI is able to largely fund the capex via internal accruals and without stretching the balance sheet

items.title: US sanctions 19 Indian firms for supplying dual-use goods to Russian military supply chain
items.description: The US has sanctioned 19 Indian firms and two nationals for allegedly supplying Russia with dual-use goods critical to its defense industry, to curb support for Russia’s military efforts. The listed companies include suppliers of aircraft parts, microelectronics, and machine tools.

items.title: RateGain Q2 FY25 – good quarter with indications of near-term softness
items.description: The company has lowered revenue guidance for the full year as order wins remain sluggish

items.title: Jai Balaji Ind Q2 net falls 24% at Rs 153 crore, proposes stock split
items.description: The company's board also proposed a stock split of its equity shares of face value of Rs 10 each paid up into five equity shares of face value of Rs two each.

items.title: AI-Vistara merger becomes reality; SIA to invest additional Rs 3,195 cr into integrated entity
items.description: The completion of the much-awaited amalgamation, which was announced in November 2022, comes within six weeks of the integration of Air India Express and AIX Connect

items.title: MTNL defaults on Rs 5,726 crore loans; total debt at Rs 32,097 crore
items.description: MTNL has defaulted on payment of Rs 173.13 crore due to paid to Punjab and Sind Bank, comprising the principal amount of Rs 166.57 crore
